Microsoft 2024 年 8 月补丁星期二修复了 9 个零日漏洞，其中 6 个被利用https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/microsoft-august-2024-patch-tuesday-fixes-9-zero-days-6-exploited/ Tue, 13 Aug 2024 14:41:36 -0400劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯MicrosoftSecurity https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/microsoft-august-2024-patch-tuesday-fixes-9-zero-days-6-exploited/ Today is Microsoft's August 2024 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for 89 flaws, including six actively exploited and three publicly disclosed zero-days. Microsoft is still working on an update for a tenth publicly disclosed zero-day. [...]
